article_title: E.J. Dionne: What Clinton and Sanders owe progressives

article_metadata.description: Compared with the ferocious fractiousness of the Republican campaign, Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders are operating by rules inspired by St. Francis of Assisi, the gentle animal-loving holy man whom Pat Buchanan once derided as “the pacifist with the pigeons.”
article_metadata.author: E.J. Dionne Opinion Columnist

og.site_name: The Herald News, Fall River, MA
